description:
Landsat 3 MSS Collection 1 Tier 2 DN values, representing scaled, calibrated at-sensor radiance.
Scenes not meeting Tier 1 criteria during
processing are assigned to Tier 2. This includes Systematic terrain (L1GT) and
Systematic (L1GS) processed scenes, as well as any L1TP scenes that do not meet
the Tier 1 specifications due to significant cloud cover, insufficient ground
control, and other factors. Users interested in Tier 2 scenes can analyze the
RMSE and other properties to determine the suitability for use in individual
applications and studies. See more information [in the USGS
docs](https://www.usgs.gov/core-science-systems/nli/landsat/landsat-collections).
gee:terms_of_use:
Landsat datasets are federally created data
and therefore reside in the public domain and may be used, transferred, or reproduced without copyright restriction.

Acknowledgement or credit of the USGS as data source should be provided
by including a line of text citation such as the example shown below.

(Product, Image, Photograph, or Dataset Name) courtesy of
the U.S. Geological Survey

Example: Landsat-7 image courtesy of the U.S. Geological Survey

See the
[USGS Visual Identity System Guidance](https://www.usgs.gov/information-policies-and-instructions/usgs-visual-identity-system)
for further details on proper citation and acknowledgement of USGS products.

links.title: Run the example for LANDSAT/LM03/C01/T2 in the Earth Engine Code Editor

eo:bands.description:
Landsat Collection 1 QA Bitmask
([See Landsat QA page](https://www.usgs.gov/land-resources/nli/landsat/landsat-collection-1-level-1-quality-assessment-band))
eo:bands.name: BQA

gee:schema.description: Percentage cloud cover (0-100), -1 = not calculated.
gee:schema.name: CLOUD_COVER

gee:schema.description: Percentage cloud cover over land (0-100), -1 = not calculated.
gee:schema.name: CLOUD_COVER_LAND

gee:schema.description: Tier of scene. (T1 or T2)
gee:schema.name: COLLECTION_CATEGORY

gee:schema.description: Number of collection.
gee:schema.name: COLLECTION_NUMBER

gee:schema.description: Internal calibration gain method for band 4.
gee:schema.name: CORRECTION_GAIN_BAND_4

gee:schema.description: Internal calibration gain method for band 5.
gee:schema.name: CORRECTION_GAIN_BAND_5

gee:schema.description: Internal calibration gain method for band 6.
gee:schema.name: CORRECTION_GAIN_BAND_6

gee:schema.description: Internal calibration gain method for band 7.
gee:schema.name: CORRECTION_GAIN_BAND_7

gee:schema.description: Calibration parameter file name.
gee:schema.name: CPF_NAME

gee:schema.description:
Current data category assigned to the data. Possible values:
("NOMINAL", "VALIDATION", "EXCHANGE", "TEST", "ENGINEERING")
gee:schema.name: DATA_CATEGORY

gee:schema.description: Data type identifier. (L1T or L1G)
gee:schema.name: DATA_TYPE

gee:schema.description: Data type identifier string used to create the L0RP product.
gee:schema.name: DATA_TYPE_L0RP

gee:schema.description: Image acquisition date. "YYYY-MM-DD"
gee:schema.name: DATE_ACQUIRED

gee:schema.description: Datum used in image creation.
gee:schema.name: DATUM

gee:schema.description: Earth sun distance in astronomical units (AU).
gee:schema.name: EARTH_SUN_DISTANCE

gee:schema.description: Elevation model source used for standard terrain corrected (L1T) products.
gee:schema.name: ELEVATION_SOURCE

gee:schema.description: Ellipsoid used in image creation.
gee:schema.name: ELLIPSOID

gee:schema.description: Ephemeris data type used to perform geometric correction. (Definitive or Predictive)
gee:schema.name: EPHEMERIS_TYPE

gee:schema.description: File date in milliseconds since epoch.
gee:schema.name: FILE_DATE

gee:schema.description: Gain state for Band 4. (L = Low gain, H = High)
gee:schema.name: GAIN_BAND_4

gee:schema.description: Gain state for Band 5. (L = Low gain, H = High)
gee:schema.name: GAIN_BAND_5

gee:schema.description: Gain state for Band 6. (L = Low gain, H = High)
gee:schema.name: GAIN_BAND_6

gee:schema.description: Gain state for Band 7. (L = Low gain, H = High)
gee:schema.name: GAIN_BAND_7

gee:schema.description:
Combined Root Mean Square Error (RMSE) of the geometric residuals
(meters) in both across-track and along-track directions
measured on the GCPs used in geometric precision correction.
Not present in L1G products.
gee:schema.name: GEOMETRIC_RMSE_MODEL

gee:schema.description:
RMSE of the X direction geometric residuals (in meters) measured
on the GCPs used in geometric precision correction. Not present in
L1G products.
gee:schema.name: GEOMETRIC_RMSE_MODEL_X

gee:schema.description:
RMSE of the Y direction geometric residuals (in meters) measured
on the GCPs used in geometric precision correction. Not present in
L1G products.
gee:schema.name: GEOMETRIC_RMSE_MODEL_Y

gee:schema.description:
RMSE of the geometric residuals (pixels) in both line and sample
directions measured on the terrain-corrected product independently
using GLS2000.
gee:schema.name: GEOMETRIC_RMSE_VERIFY

gee:schema.description:
RMSE of the geometric residuals (pixels) of the lower-left quadrant
measured on the terrain-corrected product independently using GLS2000.
gee:schema.name: GEOMETRIC_RMSE_VERIFY_QUAD_LL

gee:schema.description:
RMSE of the geometric residuals (pixels) of the lower-right quadrant
measured on the terrain-corrected product independently using GLS2000.
gee:schema.name: GEOMETRIC_RMSE_VERIFY_QUAD_LR

gee:schema.description:
RMSE of the geometric residuals (pixels) of the upper-left quadrant
measured on the terrain-corrected product independently using GLS2000.
gee:schema.name: GEOMETRIC_RMSE_VERIFY_QUAD_UL

gee:schema.description:
RMSE of the geometric residuals (pixels) of the upper-right quadrant
measured on the terrain-corrected product independently using GLS2000.
gee:schema.name: GEOMETRIC_RMSE_VERIFY_QUAD_UR

gee:schema.description: Grid cell size used in creating the image for the reflective band.
gee:schema.name: GRID_CELL_SIZE_REFLECTIVE

gee:schema.description:
The number of ground control points used. Not used in L1GT products.
Values: 0 - 999 (0 is used for L1T products that have used
Multi-scene refinement).
gee:schema.name: GROUND_CONTROL_POINTS_MODEL

gee:schema.description:
The number of ground control points used in the verification of
the terrain corrected product. Values: -1 to 1615 (-1 = not available)
gee:schema.name: GROUND_CONTROL_POINTS_VERIFY

gee:schema.description:
The number of ground control points used in the verification of
the terrain corrected product. Values: -1 to 1615 (-1 = not available)
gee:schema.name: GROUND_CONTROL_POINTS_VERSION

gee:schema.description: Image quality, 0 = worst, 9 = best, -1 = quality not calculated
gee:schema.name: IMAGE_QUALITY

gee:schema.description:
The naming convention of each Landsat Collection 1 Level-1 image based
on acquisition parameters and processing parameters.

Format: LXSS_LLLL_PPPRRR_YYYYMMDD_yyyymmdd_CC_TX

*  L = Landsat
*  X = Sensor (O = Operational Land Imager,
T = Thermal Infrared Sensor, C = Combined OLI/TIRS)
*  SS = Satellite (08 = Landsat 8)
*  LLLL = Processing Correction Level (L1TP = precision and terrain,
L1GT = systematic terrain, L1GS = systematic)
*  PPP = WRS Path
*  RRR = WRS Row
*  YYYYMMDD = Acquisition Date expressed in Year, Month, Day
*  yyyymmdd = Processing Date expressed in Year, Month, Day
*  CC = Collection Number (01)
*  TX = Collection Category (RT = Real Time, T1 = Tier 1, T2 = Tier 2)
gee:schema.name: LANDSAT_PRODUCT_ID

gee:schema.description:
The Pre-Collection naming convention of each image is based on acquisition
parameters. This was the naming convention used prior to Collection 1.

Format: LXSPPPRRRYYYYDDDGSIVV

*  L = Landsat
*  X = Sensor (O = Operational Land Imager, T = Thermal Infrared Sensor, C = Combined OLI/TIRS)
*  S = Satellite (08 = Landsat 8)
*  PPP = WRS Path
*  RRR = WRS Row
*  YYYY = Year of Acquisition
*  DDD = Julian Day of Acquisition
*  GSI = Ground Station Identifier
*  VV = Version
gee:schema.name: LANDSAT_SCENE_ID

gee:schema.description: Projection used to represent the 3-dimensional surface of the earth for the Level-1 product.
gee:schema.name: MAP_PROJECTION

gee:schema.description: L0RA map projection selectively applied to HDTs based on geographic location. Used for processed archive data.
gee:schema.name: MAP_PROJECTION_L0RA

gee:schema.description: Orientation used in creating the image. Values: NOMINAL = Nominal Path, NORTH_UP = North Up, TRUE_NORTH = True North, USER = User
gee:schema.name: ORIENTATION

gee:schema.description: Presence of Band 4 (Y = Yes, N = No, M = Missing, I = Unknown)
gee:schema.name: PRESENT_BAND_4

gee:schema.description: Presence of Band 5 (Y = Yes, N = No, M = Missing, I = Unknown)
gee:schema.name: PRESENT_BAND_5

gee:schema.description: Presence of Band 6 (Y = Yes, N = No, M = Missing, I = Unknown)
gee:schema.name: PRESENT_BAND_6

gee:schema.description: Presence of Band 7 (Y = Yes, N = No, M = Missing, I = Unknown)
gee:schema.name: PRESENT_BAND_7

gee:schema.description: Name and version of the processing software used to generate the L1 product.
gee:schema.name: PROCESSING_SOFTWARE_VERSION

gee:schema.description: Additive rescaling factor used to convert calibrated DN to radiance for Band 4.
gee:schema.name: RADIANCE_ADD_BAND_4

gee:schema.description: Additive rescaling factor used to convert calibrated DN to radiance for Band 5.
gee:schema.name: RADIANCE_ADD_BAND_5

gee:schema.description: Additive rescaling factor used to convert calibrated DN to radiance for Band 6.
gee:schema.name: RADIANCE_ADD_BAND_6

gee:schema.description: Additive rescaling factor used to convert calibrated DN to radiance for Band 7.
gee:schema.name: RADIANCE_ADD_BAND_7

gee:schema.description: Multiplicative rescaling factor used to convert calibrated Band 4 DN to radiance.
gee:schema.name: RADIANCE_MULT_BAND_4

gee:schema.description: Multiplicative rescaling factor used to convert calibrated Band 5 DN to radiance.
gee:schema.name: RADIANCE_MULT_BAND_5

gee:schema.description: Multiplicative rescaling factor used to convert calibrated Band 6 DN to radiance.
gee:schema.name: RADIANCE_MULT_BAND_6

gee:schema.description: Multiplicative rescaling factor used to convert calibrated Band 7 DN to radiance.
gee:schema.name: RADIANCE_MULT_BAND_7

gee:schema.description: Additive rescaling factor used to convert calibrated Band 4 DN to reflectance.
gee:schema.name: REFLECTANCE_ADD_BAND_4

gee:schema.description: Additive rescaling factor used to convert calibrated Band 5 DN to reflectance.
gee:schema.name: REFLECTANCE_ADD_BAND_5

gee:schema.description: Additive rescaling factor used to convert calibrated Band 6 DN to reflectance.
gee:schema.name: REFLECTANCE_ADD_BAND_6

gee:schema.description: Additive rescaling factor used to convert calibrated Band 7 DN to reflectance.
gee:schema.name: REFLECTANCE_ADD_BAND_7

gee:schema.description: Multiplicative factor used to convert calibrated Band 4 DN to reflectance.
gee:schema.name: REFLECTANCE_MULT_BAND_4

gee:schema.description: Multiplicative factor used to convert calibrated Band 5 DN to reflectance.
gee:schema.name: REFLECTANCE_MULT_BAND_5

gee:schema.description: Multiplicative factor used to convert calibrated Band 6 DN to reflectance.
gee:schema.name: REFLECTANCE_MULT_BAND_6

gee:schema.description: Multiplicative factor used to convert calibrated Band 7 DN to reflectance.
gee:schema.name: REFLECTANCE_MULT_BAND_7

gee:schema.description: Number of product lines for the reflective bands.
gee:schema.name: REFLECTIVE_LINES

gee:schema.description: Number of product samples for the reflective bands.
gee:schema.name: REFLECTIVE_SAMPLES

gee:schema.description:
Request id, nnnyymmdd0000_0000

*  nnn = node number
*  yy = year
*  mm = month
*  dd = day
gee:schema.name: REQUEST_ID

gee:schema.description: Resampling option used in creating the image.
gee:schema.name: RESAMPLING_OPTION

gee:schema.description: Flag indicating saturated pixels for band 4 ('Y'/'N')
gee:schema.name: SATURATION_BAND_4

gee:schema.description: Flag indicating saturated pixels for band 5 ('Y'/'N')
gee:schema.name: SATURATION_BAND_5

gee:schema.description: Flag indicating saturated pixels for band 6 ('Y'/'N')
gee:schema.name: SATURATION_BAND_6

gee:schema.description: Flag indicating saturated pixels for band 7 ('Y'/'N')
gee:schema.name: SATURATION_BAND_7

gee:schema.description:
Scene center time of acquired image. HH:MM:SS.SSSSSSSZ

*  HH = Hour (00-23)
*  MM = Minutes
*  SS.SSSSSSS = Fractional seconds
*  Z = "Zulu" time (same as GMT)
gee:schema.name: SCENE_CENTER_TIME

gee:schema.description: Sensor used to capture data.
gee:schema.name: SENSOR_ID

gee:schema.description: Spacecraft identification.
gee:schema.name: SPACECRAFT_ID

gee:schema.description: Ground Station/Organisation that received the data.
gee:schema.name: STATION_ID

gee:schema.description: Sun azimuth angle in degrees for the image center location at the image center acquisition time.
gee:schema.name: SUN_AZIMUTH

gee:schema.description: Sun elevation angle in degrees for the image center location at the image center acquisition time.
gee:schema.name: SUN_ELEVATION

gee:schema.description: UTM zone number used in product map projection.
gee:schema.name: UTM_ZONE

gee:schema.description: The WRS orbital path number (001 - 251).
gee:schema.name: WRS_PATH

gee:schema.description: Landsat satellite WRS row (001-248).
gee:schema.name: WRS_ROW

title: USGS Landsat 3 MSS Collection 1 Tier 2 Raw Scenes [deprecated]
